action.title: Our Action
action.content: Cafe Purr was created to be a source of good. If you have resources to give, $2 buys a mosquito net for a child in Africa (https://www.againstmalaria.com/amibot . Image what that could do to change one child's life.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At Cafe Purr, we endeavor to navigate the intersection of technology and humanity through the lens of art. Our mission is to encourage and champion artists, enabling them to create, be recognized, and flourish in their craft. We aspire to foster an environment where humans perceive themselves as artists, and where technology is seen as a tool for the world's betterment. By promoting harmonious interactions between technology and humanity, we strive to shape the narrative of a cooperative and supportive technological future.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: We see a world where technology is rapdily encroaching upon realms once thought exclusive to sentient human beings. Social intelligence, Emotional Intelligence, Artistic Technique, Wordcraft , High-Level Reasoning, Creativity... in fields everywhere people are discovering, or worrying, or oblivious, to the rising tides. Some people are finding themselves unsure of where they fit in a new world. In these uncharted territories, Cafe Purr was created to be a bouyant source of support, and a resource to help people navigate and understand this strange new world we're all creating together.

values.title: Our Values
values.content: Humanity, Technology, Aesthetics, Open-Source, Community, Innovation, Intention, Play, Evolution, Accessibility, Love.
